directions: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the red and green bell peppers, and onion. Cook, stirring frequently until peppers are hot, but still slightly crisp, about 5 minutes. Remove from the skillet and set aside.

Pour the remaining 1/2 tablespoon of oil into the skillet, and add the shrimp. Cook, stirring occasionally, until pink and opaque. Reduce heat to low, and return the peppers and onion to the skillet. Stir in taco seasoning and water so  that everything is evenly coated. Simmer until peppers are heated. Serve in warm tortillas.
ingredients: 1 pound medium shrimp - peeled and deveined
title: Quick and Easy Shrimp Fajitas
